name: OklahomaJoe's
0:
”Alexa, load Oklahoma Joe's and tell me my grill temperature.”
”Alexa, load Oklahoma Joe's and turn my grill off.”
”Alexa, load Oklahoma Joe's and tell me my probe temperatures.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oklahoma joe's
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The easiest way to control your cook from your Alexa device

DIAL IT IN 
Set the temperature on your Oklahoma Joe’s grill or smoker with Alexa, set a target probe temperature to get your food right where you want it. Start and stop your timers remotely and stay on top of your cook from anywhere. 

MONITOR
Ask Alexa for updates on your grill or smoker temperature and your probe temperatures. Also ask Alexa for timer status
